item.title: Vegence code need'd
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

case 161: {
if(actionTimer == 0){
{
actionTimer = 10;
stillgfx(401, absY, absX);
for(int I = 0; I < 20; I++)
{
}
for(int I = 0; I <= 6; I++)
{
strPot = true;
strPotTimer = 90;
cba = abc / 10;
abc2 = cba * 2;
if (abc2 <= 1) {
abc2 = 2;
}
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
break;
}
inCombat();
attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1);
setAnimation(1914);
txt4 = “Taste vengeance!”;
string4UpdateRequired = true;
RemoveAllWindows();
}
}
}
sendMessage(“You gain the energy around you!”);
break;
case 53204:
closeInterface();
break;
